target: 喂，你是总部的人！你可以开这道门吗？

source: Hey. You're the new security guy right?
Hmm.. How do we get out of here?
target: 嗯…我们该怎样从这里出去？

source: Hmm.. they must be looking for HQ's base.
target: 嗯..他们一定在寻找总部的基地。

source: Hold [ALT] and click the blue arrow to warp.
target: 按住[ALT]并单击蓝色箭头以传送。

source: Hold [ALT] to level skills from the top of HUD.
target: 按紧【ALT】键从顶部的HUD里添加技能点。

source: Hold [Right Click] to boost over the gap.
target: 按住[右键单击]以增加间隙。
按住[右键单击]进行加速。

source: Holy shit!! I'm such a badass!
How do I keep forgetting that..
How'd you get back there? That's for HQ only.
target: 你怎么到后面的？那里只有总部的可以去。·

source: Huh, a Warp Field. That's convenient..
target: 哈，一个传送场，那真方便...

source: Hundreds of men. Armed with our strongest skills.
target: 数百人。 拥有着我们最强大的技能。

source: I always fight alone. It looks cooler.
target: 我一直都独自战斗，感觉酷炫。

source: I can lock the trains. But you need to take care of these Rebels.
target: 我可以锁定火车。但你得“照顾好”这些叛军.

source: I can't keep track of how many zombies you've killed.
target: 我都忘了你杀了多少个僵尸。

source: I can't wait any longer.. Guards, kill them!
target: 我等不及了。。保安，杀掉他们！

source: I could have achieved so much!!
I don't care how powerful he is. Find the test-subject!
target: 我不管他多厉害，找到测试品！

source: I dunno where this goes. But anywhere is better than here.
target: ：我不知道这是去哪的。 但哪里都比这里好。

source: I feel that red suits my personality better, hot and passionate.
target: 我觉得红色更适合我的个性，热情和热血。

source: I forgot I could do that..
I heard an explosion. Who detonated the western fail-safe?
target: 我听到有东西爆炸了。是谁引爆了西边的保险套件？

source: I hope you're worth it.. or this was all for nothing.
target: 我希望你能证明自己...或者这一切都是没用的...

source: I just needed a sample of your winning DNA...
target: 我只需要你获胜DNA的样本......

source: I know. And if they get onto the trains they'll infect the entire city.
target: 我知道。 如果他们上火车，他们将感染整个城市。

source: I respected you far more as a scientist.
target: 作为一名科学家，我更尊重你。

source: I see you met the previous test-subjects.
target: ：我看到你遇到了以前的测试品。

source: I sure am. I prepared this speech months ago.
target: 我确定。 几个月前我准备了这个演讲。

source: I think I know why the Rebels went crazy.
target: 我想我知道为什么叛军发疯了。

source: I threw down some supplies. Can you get those Tasers?
target: 我扔了一些补给品。 你能得到那些泰瑟枪吗？

source: I turned the Rebels violent for one simple reason...
target: 因为一个简单的原因，我让叛军变得暴力......

source: I was busy changing my shirt.
I was special forces before  HQ hired me as security.
target: 我曾经效力于特种部队… 总部雇佣我来干安保工作。

source: I won't wear Scientist colors any more. And this red really pops!
target: 我不会再穿科学家的颜色了。 而这个红色真的很流行！

source: I'd do it myself, but uhhh.. I injured my back lifting test tubes.
target: 我自己做，但是呃......我的背部抬试管的时候受伤了。

source: I'd just thought he was into Star Wars cosplay.
target: 我只是觉得他参加了星球大战的角色扮演。

source: I'll admit - I'm a tad more aggressive than usual..
target: 我承认 - 我比往常更有攻击性......

source: I'll toss it down for you. Over here.
I'm all jacked up. On pure adrenaline.. and you still beat me?!
target: 我嗑多了..纯的肾上腺素.但是你还是打败了我？！

source: I'm calling it now... they're the real bad guys.
target: 我现在正打电话给他们......他们是真正的坏人。

source: I'm just a bit nervous. I dunno if I can do this.
target: 我只是有点紧张。我不确定我能不能干这事..

source: I'm mostly here for moral support.. and advancing the plot.
target: 我主要是为了道义上的支持......并且推进了这个阴谋。

source: I'm reviewing the security footage now. It wasn't one of us.
target: 我现在正在审查录像带。 这不是我们中的任何一个。

source: I'm serious son.. there's something special about you.
target: 我是认真的。。你看起来有点特别。

source: I'm sorry! I'm too beautiful to die.
I've watched you play my game for a while now...
target: 我已经注意你玩我的游戏很久了。。。

source: If the one below explodes we'll lose everything.
target: 如果下面的爆的话我们就全都没了。

source: If this ever happens again.. we'll be ready.
target: 如果这再次发生。。我们会准备好的。

source: If you're gunna save the world might as well do it in style, right??
target: 如果你要拯救世界，不妨在风格上做到这一点，对吧？

source: In all my years I've never seen someone so.. gifted.
target: 在我这么多年里，我从来没有见过这样的人......有天赋。

source: In completely unrelated news.. I'm feeling a bit strange this morning
target: 另外插播一条不相关的新闻… 我今天早上感觉不太对劲

source: Indeed.. Let's scan the room in an elaborate yet predictable manner.
target: 确实..让我们以精心设计但可预测的方式扫描房间。

source: Irritable. Aggressive even.. very unlike me.
target: 烦躁。甚至有点好斗… 很不像我。

source: It helps us focus. More drive. More aggression!
target: 这能让我专心，聚焦，并更能打！

source: It might help you in your adventures. Follow me.
target: 它可能会帮上你的。 跟着我。

source: It'd make these escort missions way easier.
target: 它使这些护送任务更容易。

source: It's all top secret stuff. We really shouldn't be here.
target: 这全都是机密。我们不应该在这。

source: It's like a drug. Hook it to my veins!
target: 这就像一种毒品。 钩住我的血管！

source: It's not senseless. We have a purpose. We're looking for the source.
target: 这不是没有意义的。 我们有一个目的。 我们正在寻找消息来源。
一切都会变好的。。我到了。

source: It's the only way to test his genetic code.
target: 这是测试他的遗传基因的唯一方法。

source: Just take a deep breath and relax.
Just you wait.. the ceiling is about to come down.
target: 你等等吧。。天花板已经要倒下了。

source: Kill 30 zombies to detonate the bomb.
target: 杀死30个丧尸来引爆炸弹。

source: Kill them on sight. We cannot let them find HQ!
target: 见到他们就杀。 我们不能让他们找到总部！

source: Let me repay you. In my hidings I found a magical unlock.
target: 让我报答你。 在我的藏身处，我发现了一个神奇的解锁器。

source: Let us ride in an automobile.
Let's get out of here! This place is about to collapse.
target: 我们快点离开这！这个地方要倒了。

source: Let's just go to the next level, OK?
target: 让我们进入下一级吧，好吗？
让我们把它混合起来..重复!!

source: Listen up! These nutjobs are out of control.
target: 听着！ 这些坚果不受控制。

source: Lock and load guys, I need an escort.
Look I know it's your first day.. but there's been a rebellion.
target: 看，我知道这是你的第一天上班..但这里有人当叛军..

source: Look I'm trying to create a sense of urgency here...
target: 看，我试图在这里创造一种紧迫感......

source: Look Knickers, we've gotta go. Try to relax ok?
target: 看看老兄，我们得走了。 试着放松一下好吗？

source: Looks like the Rebels have been cut off.
target: 看起来叛军已经甩掉了。

source: Man what is this green stuff? It stinks!
target: 这些青色的东西是什么呀？很臭！

source: Most test-subjects died on the first level...
target: 大多数测试品在第一级死亡......

source: My boss is evil... Now I see why he wears that cape and scary helmet.
target: 我的老板是邪恶的...现在我明白为什么他戴着斗篷和可怕的头盔。

source: Nice, I think that's all of them.
target: 不错，我觉得有那么多罢了。

source: Nice, some skill points. I'd put some points into Self Repair.
target: 干得漂亮。你得到了点技能点。是我我就用来学习自我修复。

source: No no, the water is fine. And here, we can prove it.
target: 不，水很好。 在这里，我们可以证明这一点。

source: No please!!! You said we could live if -
target: 拜托不要！！！你说我们可以活的如果 -

source: No thanks. Senseless violence ain't my thing.
target: 还是算了。毫无知觉的暴力我可不喜欢。

source: No. I think it was the test subject.
target: 不，我认为这是科学实验。

source: Not them either sir.. It looks like the test-subject.
target: 先生！不是他们..它看起来像测试品。

source: Not yet sir. He's quite.. strong.
Now.. what was that damn pass -
OK there's the exit. Go now and be free!
target: OK 出口就在那。快点出去吧！

source: Of course, it's at sea. Come on, let's go!
target: 当然，它在海上。 来吧，我们走吧！

source: Oh cool, headquarters is dropping supplies.
target: 哦，很酷，总部正在减少供应。

source: Oh cool, you guys killing zombies??
Oh god this water feels soooooo good!
Oh hey Knickers. The Rebels captured us.
target: 哦，嘿老兄。 叛军抓住了我们。

source: Oh look, it's the new guy.. You're doing a great job out there!
target: 哦，看，这是新人..你在那里做得很好！

source: Oh man.. we blew it all up!
target: 哦，伙计......我们把它炸没了！

source: Oh my God. I can see the edge of the map!
target: 我的天啊。 我可以看到地图的边缘！

source: Oh no.. I've been captured... somehow.
target: 哦不..我被抓了...不知道怎么的。

source: Oh please. You both look the same.
target: 哦拜托。 你们看起来都一样。

source: Oh shit we crashed! That's my bad.
Oh shit, are you guys OK?
Oh shit, you tripped the alarm. Hurry up, they're coming for us!
target: 操，你触发警报了，快点他们要来了！

source: Oh yeah, the Rebel's live here. Let's sneak inside.
target: 哦耶，叛军就住在这。我们就这么偷偷摸进去。

source: Oh.. could you give us a gun?
target: 哦。。你可以给我们一把枪吗？

source: Ok I'll try. What's the password?
Ok I'm done. God's of science.. I'm ready!
target: 好了，我完成了。 科学之力......我准备好了！

source: Ok guys, move on up! Almost there.
target: 好的，继续前进！ 差不多了。

source: Ok so.. if you had just ONE weakness.. what would it be?
target: 好的..如果你只有一个弱点......它会是什么？

source: Ok, newbies. Grab a gun and help us find the source.
target: 好的，新人。 拿吧枪帮我们找找源头。

source: Ok, no problem.. Move out team.
Ok, well.. can you open this one then? We've gotta get inside.
target: 好的。。你可以开这个吗？我们必须进去。

source: One last thing though.. Kill them.
Ooo yeah... Self Repair feels gooood!
target: 真棒......自我修复感觉真舒服！

source: Oooh a journal. Gimme that backstory.
target: 哦，一本日记。 给我看看故事。

source: Open the doors! I gotta get out of here!
Or at least.. it can't be safe. C'mon let's go!
target: 或者至少......它不安全。 来吧！

source: Our only hope is to warp out of here.
target: 我们唯一的希望就是传送出去。

source: Ow! Those blue guys really hurt.
target: 噢！ 那些蓝人真的受伤了。

source: Press [B] to buy ammo from the yellow checkpoint.
target: 按下[B]键来在黄色的检查点购买弹药。

source: Protect the test-subjects from the HQ scientists.
target: 保护科学实验品免受总部科学家的影响。

source: Remember, we need to capture one alive.
target: 记住，我们得抓个活的回来。

source: See that bomb? We can use it to wipe out the zombies.
target: 看见那炸弹没？我们可以用它消灭僵尸。

source: Short story. How do we get outta here?
Silence slave! Just don't bump me.
Sir, we're trying to stop the test-subject. But he's grown too strong.
target: 先生，我们正试图阻止测试对象。 但他成长得太强大了。

source: So in other words.. you want drugs.
So no, we're pretty far from OK. Now get us out of here!
target: 不，我们根本不好，帮我们弄出去！

source: So that's the source huh.. Destroy that the game is up.
target: 看来那就是根源啊。。把那玩意毁掉。

source: So uhh, remind me again.. where are we?
target: 呃，要不再说一次…我们现在人在哪呢？

source: So we decided to find the perfect specimen..
target: 我们决定要找到完美的标本。。

source: So what do you say.. Ready for another day in the Lab?
target: 那你打算怎样…准备好在实验室再过一天？

source: Some lab techs.. They're releasing the clones!
target: 这群技术佬...他们在释放克隆人！

source: Something must've happened there. Let's check it out.
target: 这里肯定发生过什么，我们先过去看看。

source: Sorry no can do.. That would make things too easy.
target: 抱歉不行。。那就太简单了。

source: Stand still inside the Warp, hold [ALT] and click the blue arrow up the top of the screen.
target: 在传送力场中站稳，按住[ALT]键并点击屏幕顶部的蓝色箭头。

source: Stay back a bit, would you?
Take a look.. It's just a drug that HQ developed.
target: 过来看看…这就是总部研发的药品。

source: Take him to the boss. I'll check inside.
target: 把他带到老大那里。我要进去看看。

source: Thank you. You're a gentleman and a scholar.
target: 谢谢你。你真是一位极富绅士风度的学者。

source: Thanks. C'mon let's get out of here.
target: 谢了。我们赶紧离开这里。

source: That must be the source. Destroy that and it game over man. Game over.
target: 那应该就是来源。把他打爆，游戏就结束了。

source: The Lab of course. The zombies went crazy. Swarmed us!
target: 当然是从实验室那来的。僵尸们都疯了。把我们围了起来！

source: The Rebels were a test. A challenge.. A game.
target: 叛军们是一场考验，一局挑战以及…一场比赛。

source: The better the code.. the better the skills.
target: 代码水平越好…技能也越好。

source: The boss called. He's seen enough.
target: 老板刚打过电话。他看够了。

source: The boss is impressed.. He's promoted you to HQ!
target: 老板挺喜欢你的…他提拔你到总部了！

source: The hell? Did the Rebels do this?

target: 那个入侵者!! 他把所有人都杀了！

source: The other fail-safe is through here.
target: 另一个保险套件通过这里就能找到。

source: The outbreak! The supply drops. The checkpoints...
target: 这场爆发！那些空投补给，那些检查点…

source: The source of the water. Where it's most pure.
target: 这就是水源。这也是水最纯净的地方。

source: The source will be ours! Mwahahaha!
target: 源头将会是我们的！哼哼哼哈哈哈！

source: The source? They just gasped for air and dropped dead.
target: 源头？他们一吸入空气就死了。

source: The test-subject? He's here!? I ordered you fools to capture him!
target: 测试体呢？他在这儿！？我现在命令你们这群傻瓜赶紧抓住他！

source: Then who? The Rebels? They don't know where we are.
target: 还能是谁？叛军？他们都不知道我们在哪。

source: There are more civilians in here.
There are still a few Rebels down there.
There they are. Let's find a way in there.
target: 就是那样。我们赶紧在那找条路吧。

source: There's the bomb. You two stay up here. We'll head down.
target: 那就是炸弹。你们两个就留在这。我们下去看看。
这些子弹就在我脸前飞过…

source: They all lived in the same place - it's a few blocks south of here.
target: 他们都生活在同一个地方 - 在这里以南的几个街区。

source: They gave me a grenade! But maybe you should have it.
target: 他们给我了个手雷！不过我觉得你才应该拿上它。

source: They really should've made these barriers see-through.
target: 他们真应该把屏障改成透明的。

source: They'll attack when you least suspect -
target: 它们专会在你不注意时进行攻击 -

source: They're all built from a genetic code.
target: 它们都是用一段遗传密码来构建的。

source: They're coming! How am I gunna get out..
target: 他们要来了！我该怎么出去呢。。

source: They've been running tests on us for weeks..
target: 他们已经在我们身体上做了很多测试。。

source: They've swarmed the bomb. Lemme help.
target: 他们已经包围了炸弹。我来帮帮他们。

source: They've swarmed the city. We gotta go!
target: 他们包围了整个城市，我们快走吧！

source: Things were quiet 'till you lot showed up!
target: 本来很安静，直到你出现为止！

source: Think of all the skills we develop...
target: 想想我们开发的所有技能…

source: This is crazy! You're loco man. Just don't get tunnel vision!
target: 真是疯了！你这个疯子。千万别只注意这一点！

source: This is the Rebel quarters. Let's find a way in there.
target: 这是叛军的地盘。看看咱们能不能摸进去。

source: This isn't a movie. He's not James Bond! Just capture him!
target: 这不是电影。他也不是詹姆斯邦德！赶紧抓他！

source: This isn't good.. the outbreak is spreading.
This story is almost over. I can feel it!
target: 故事快结束了。我能感觉到！

source: To prove his strength. To use his winning DNA.
target: 展现他的力量。使用他作为胜者的DNA。

source: To see if you could beat them...
To teleport, stand in the Warp Field, hold [ALT] and click the blue arrow.
target: 如需传送，站在迁跃力场中，按住[ALT]键并点击蓝色箭头。

source: Try blast them with your Force Fields.
target: 使用用你的力场，看看能不能炸翻他们。

source: Try kill him with your Force Field explosion.
target: 使用你的力场来用爆炸杀死他。

source: Try that keypad. Same code as always. 1234.
target: 试试那边的键盘。还是之前的老代码。1234。

source: Turn that thing off. We're under attack!
target: 把那东西关掉。我们正在受到袭击！

source: Ugh. We really have to stop placing bombs in our secret bases..
target: 呃。我们真得不能再我们的秘密基地里摆放这些炸弹。。

source: Ugh. You actually did it.. you defeated me.
target: 呃。你居然真的办到了…你打败了我。

source: Uhhh sir? Our filtration system was destroyed.
target: 嗯，先生？我们的过滤系统被破坏了。

source: Uhmm Will... You sure it's safe up there?
Use it wisely. Shoot straight and true. All the best, kind traveller.
target: 好好用它。做到稳准狠。祝你好运，善良的旅行者。

source: Very well. You leave me no choice.
Wait you can't kill me! I'm essential to the plot -
target: 等一下，你不能杀了我！我对故事情节发展很重要 -

source: Wait!! I'll tell you. Just let us live.
target: 等下！！我告诉你。给我们一条活路吧。

source: We captured one of them. Come quick!
target: 我们抓住了其中一个。快点来！

source: We captured the final Rebels too. They're locked in the garage.
target: 我们也抓住了最后的叛军。他们都被锁在车库里。

source: We don't know the coordinates yet.
We got lost... how do we get out of here??
target: 我们迷路了…我们怎么离开这儿？？

source: We had it all wrong. The world is flat after all.
target: 我们全都搞错了。世界其实是平的。

source: We had to give him skills to see how he'd use them.
target: 我们得给他点技能，看看他会怎么使用。

source: We have orders to capture him, dead or alive!
target: 我们得到命令要捕获他，死的活的都可以！

source: We have to detonate this bomb to clear the contamination.
target: 我们必须引爆这枚炸弹来清除污染。

source: We have to go around, c'mon!
We might as well check it out.
We need his code...  Bring him to me. Dead or alive.
target: 我们需要他的代码…把他带到我这。死的活的都可以。

source: We never should have drugged you fools. You've gone insane!
target: 我们真不该给你灌药。你都已经疯了！

source: We opened doors to guide you.. Gave you just enough cash to fight.
target: 我们开了一些门路来指引你…给你足够的钱去战斗。

source: We spashed around a bit. Pretty cool I guess, though the water smells awful
target: 我们溅了点水花。感觉还挺好玩的，不过水闻起来挺糟糕

source: We'd drug some Rebels. Then hire someone to save the day.
target: 我们会给一些叛军灌点药。再雇些人来拯救这一天。

source: We'll destroy the source and save the world!
target: 我们会摧毁源头，然后拯救世界！

source: We'll load the zombies on when we're done.
target: 我们干完了就把僵尸都装上。

source: We'll take you to him... Just step in here...
target: 我们会带你去见他…你先站在这…

source: We're not giving you shit. Now if you're done monologuing...
target: 我们什么都不会给的。你的演讲完了没…

source: We're not here to play games. We're here to stop you.
target: 我们不是来这玩游戏，我们是来阻止你的。

source: We're trying! But he's a super mutant. That's the whole point!
target: 我们确实在努力！但他是超级突变人啊。这才是重点！

source: We've already play-tested so many skills...
target: 我们已经测试过了很多技能…

source: We've gotta get these civilians outta here.
target: 我们一定要把平民带走。

source: We've run the test so many times...
target: 我们做这个实验已经很多次了…

source: Well he's proven himself. So for the love of God kill him.
target: 他确实证明了自己的实力。那么干他娘的赶紧把他杀了。

source: Well let us help. I wanna test these sweet blades!
target: 我们这就来帮忙。我正好想试试这堆美妙小刀片！

source: Well my friend does most of the actual killing..
target: 其实大多数都是我朋友杀的。。

source: Well that's just asking to be explored!
target: 那不就在叫我们去探索吗！
嗯哼，现在所有人都醒了。

source: Welp, this is it. The final showdown.
target: 嗯哼，就是现在。最终大对决。

source: What a twist! HQ drugged the Rebels.
target: 这剧情走向有点出乎意料！总部居然给叛军灌了药。

source: What are they doing anyway.. they're just walking in circles.
target: 他们到底在做什么…他们只是在不停绕圈。

source: What the hell is going on up here?
What the hell!? Johnson, get out here!
target: 卧槽！？约翰逊，给我滚出去！

source: What the.. how'd you do that?
What's the matter buddy? Are you ok?
What, drugging the Rebels? It's for the greater good.
target: 还以为什么，不就是给叛军灌药？这是为了大局着想。

source: When fuelled by violence.. It's such a rush!
target: 这种暴力在身体内涌动的感觉…真是太上头了！

source: Where is HQ? Where do you make the water?!
target: 总部在哪？水是在哪里制造的？！

source: Why I oughta... I'll teach them a thing or two!
target: 为什么我要…我得好好给他们上一课！

source: Why are the Rebels doing all this anyway?
target: 为什么叛军还是一直在干这个？

source: Why do they call us.. test-subjects?
target: 他们为什么叫我们…测试体？
你为什么一定要嘲讽我呢？？

source: Woop woop. The boss is here!
Yeah but there are hundreds of us.
target: 话是这么说但我们的数量倒是有上百个。

source: Yeah sorry about that throw. I'm not very coordinated.
target: 刚才那一扔真是不好意思。我的定位准确度不行。

source: Yeah, but it's cool.. They're a lot of fun.
target: 是的，但是很酷。。超好玩的。

source: Yeah, but then the Rebels went crazy.. and you have too!
target: 是的，但是反叛者疯了......你也一样！

source: Yeauk this water stinks! What is HQ doing down here?
target: 哎呀这水都发臭了！总部在这里干什么呢？

source: Yes!! C'mon man we're saving the world here!
target: 嗯！！伙计啊，我们在这明明就是在拯救世界！

source: You beat me at my own game...
target: 你能在我的游戏中把我给击败…

source: You can use this to teleport directly to the bomb.
target: 你可以使用它直接传送到炸弹位置。

source: You could've opened that door a bit earlier..
You damn fools! You don't know what -
You drugged the Rebels and sent them insane. Why??
target: 你给叛军下了药又逼疯了他们。为什么？？

source: You go ahead. Try not to get bit.

target: 你们可以瞬移吗？好厉害。

source: You ready? Click the blue arrow up top and let's warp outta here!
target: 你准备好了没？点击上面的蓝色箭头，把我们迁跃出去！

source: You saved me! Take this cash as thanks.
target: 你救了我！这笔钱给你当作感谢吧。

source: You sure you don't want to join us?
You want me to open that door down there?
You'll do WHAT to my mother!?
You're not going to start monologuing, are you?
target: 你还没开始演讲的打算，对吧？

source: You're not like these other weaklings.
target: 你不像其他的那群弱者。

source: You're too cliche for me. Now take this!
target: 你还是太老套了。现在就来尝尝这个吧！

source: You're too late - the clones are free!
target: 你太晚了 - 克隆人都逃走了！

source: You've got skills man. That cape suits you.
target: 你挺有一套的。那披风还真适合你。

source: You've knocked those zombies off the rails! Don't run out of steam!
target: 你已经把那些僵尸从铁轨上甩了下去！别把蒸汽用完了！

source: Your game has worked a little too well...
target: 你的游戏运作得太过好了点…

source: [Left Click] to fire the stinger missiles.
